page.title: 14The Church
page.content: The area is served by the Rector who lives at Falstone and the non-conformist minister residing in Bellingham. People attend church at Falstone or Bellingham. During the summer month services have been held in Thorneyborn culminating in the Harvest Festival when the church was full. Both Greystead and Thorneyburn were built to the same basic plan. They are pleasant greystone buildings with square towers. Thorneyburn contains some beautiful stained glass and a set of kneelers worked by parishioners to individual designs but to an overall colour scheme. Churchgoes are presently trying to decide what is best to be done with two buildings and a dwindling congregation.
